items.sentence: Tickets are still available for tonight\'s show.
Tom acts like he doesn\'t even know who Mary is.
Tom added both his and Mary\'s name to the list.
This isn\'t my umbrella; it\'s somebody else\'s.
Tom has probably forgotten what Mary looks like.
Tom has something he needs to discuss with Mary.
Tom has the bad habit of jumping to conclusions.
It\'s obvious you two want to be alone together.
It\'s okay as long as no one finds out about it.
It\'s unlikely that Tom will attend the meeting.
